price: Nítorí náà, nígbà tí sánmọ̀ bá fàya pẹ́rẹpẹ̀rẹ, ó sì máa pọ́n wá wẹ̀ bí epo pupa gbígbá.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
